remarks: Version of ~ ceqsexv with an antecedent instead of a hypothesis.  (Use ~ ceqsexgv instead of this one. --NM 13-Aug-11) (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 19-Oct-2010.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ceqsex3v.1OLD $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsex3vOLD $p |- ( A e. _V -> ( E. x ( x = A /\ ph ) <-> ps ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ps x $.
